name: irule
description: F5 Networks iRules Extension. Supports all BIG-IP versions up to 17.1

conf.irule-lang.diag.whenprio.enable.description: Enable/disable code diagnostic for when missing priority.

conf.irule-lang.diag.set.dynamic.enable.description: Enable/disable code diagnostic for set targeting dynamic variable.

conf.irule-lang.diag.doublesubst.enable.description: Enable/disable code diagnostic for double substition.

conf.irule-lang.diag.arginject.enable.description: Enable/disable code diagnostic for argument injection.

conf.irule-lang.diag.deprecated_events.e.description: Enable/disable code diagnostic for deprecated events.

conf.irule-lang.diag.deprecated_commands.description: Enable/disable code diagnostic for deprecated commands.

conf.irule-lang.diag.invalid_char_auto.e.description: Enable/disable code diagnostic for obvious invalid characters that can be fixed automatically.

conf.irule-lang.diag.invalid_char_manual.description: Enable/disable code diagnostic for invalid characters that need manual interpretation.

commands.title: Escape Selections to Tcl Quoted String

scripts.vscode:prepublish: webpack --mode production && npx js-yaml syntaxes/irule.tmlanguage.yaml > out/syntaxes/irule.json
scripts.webpack: webpack --mode development && npx js-yaml syntaxes/irule.tmlanguage.yaml > out/syntaxes/irule.json
scripts.webpack-dev: webpack --mode development --watch && npx js-yaml syntaxes/irule.tmlanguage.yaml > out/syntaxes/irule.json
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
